title: [Question] Do we need to purchase books for BTech first year?
content: Do we need to purchase books or can we study from pdfs?

comments.body:
For me I needed to purchase only 1 book, but if you act fast ull get the books from library
Most teachers don't force on books, mostly read from slides

U might need the tb for engineering mechanics statics depending on ur prof. For the rest of the courses slides r more than enough, if u wish u can use the pdfs of the respective tbs too no need to purchase them
You can just use soft copies, no need to buy

For me only Mechanics statics textbook we needed to buy. I didnt even do that since people started black marketing that book. I just borrowed that book from the library and kept re-issuing it every 2 weeks. Saved like 800-1200 bucks (including student black market prices)

I dont even know what books they used for 1st year, or 2nd year. Only for Mechanics : Statics

PS: I have 11 CGPA
Some guy stocked up like 9ish books and sold atleast 2 high prices cuz ppl were dumb enough to not check mrp
Just take it from library lmao or a pdf
